experiences.title: Software Development Engineer
experiences.description: Refined data processing in model build and analysis pipeline, transforming raw data into inferred values with comprehensive automated unit and integration testing. Optimized system scalability through time complexity improvements, enhancing overall performance. Troubleshot and resolved model build pipeline failures in staging and production environments using CloudWatch logs. Streamlined and automated DevOps processes by restructuring CI/CD workflows with GitHub Actions. Implementing data export/import functionality for timeseries data purge and restore, improving database efficiency and data lifecycle management.
experiences.reasoning: This position involved comprehensive experience in software development, focusing on refining data processing pipelines and enhancing system performance through optimization and automation.

experiences.title: Graduate Services Assistant
experiences.company: Ira A. Fulton Schools of Engineering at Arizona State University
experiences.description: Grader for CSE 536 Advanced Operating Systems course (Spring 2023) under School of Computing and Augmented Intelligence (SCAI). Activities included preparing and reviewing coursework, assisting students during office hours, and grading assignments.
reference_context: School of Computing and Augmented Intelligence
experiences.reasoning: This experience provided an opportunity to develop organizational and teaching skills by assisting with course management and student interaction.

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern - Python Developer, DevOps Engineer
experiences.description: Refined data processing in model build and analysis pipeline in a distributed system for transforming raw data to inferred values followed by end-to-end manual and automated unit testing and integration tests. Did scaling and performance optimization to address scalability requirements by optimizing time complexity. Diagnosed and remedied model build pipeline failures in staging and production environments using Cloudwatch logs. Automated deployment DevOps process by restructuring CI/CD workflows using GitHub Actions.
reference_context: Refined data processing and build pipelines
experiences.reasoning: Focused on enhancing software systems and DevOps processes by implementing refined techniques in data processing and automation.

experiences.title: Software Engineer - PL/SQL Developer
experiences.description: Implemented OFSAA LLFP fintech solutions in SIT, UAT and provided post-implementation support in Production environments for 2 international financial banking firms. Engineered 6 GUI based workflow runs for ETL pipelines with numerous tasks and integrated them with backend scripts to process data from Pre-staging to end-user report generation stage. Enhanced UI for Individual Assessment (IA) module based on XML Forms Framework by customizing 4 UI Forms and 8 PL/SQL scripts to process over 300k customer records by proposing to debug existing legacy code. Generated PL/SQL scripts for data manipulation and validation to automate manual tasks for filtering source data that helped reduce execution times by 20% while generating end-user reports containing customer data for over 6 months. Documented technical designs and deployed code packages across environments via WinSCP/PuTTY client-server apps.
experiences.reasoning: This role required proficiency in PL/SQL and experience with fintech solutions, focusing on UI enhancements and process automation to improve efficiency.

experiences.title: Embedded C++ Developer
experiences.description: Worked under Dr. Joby Antony (Formerly Visiting Scientist, CERN, Geneva). Designed software modules for ARM Cortex-M3 embedded server sensor device to measure subzero temperatures. Troubleshooted bugs and optimized the system to handle real-time sensor data via RPC transfer protocols.
reference_context: ARM Cortex-M3 embedded server sensor device
experiences.reasoning: This position provided experience in embedded systems development and troubleshooting real-time data processing, which is crucial for efficient and reliable system operation.

experiences.title: Python Developer
experiences.description: Worked under the guidance of Ms. Vanita Agarwal, Assistant Professor. Successfully modeled discrete mathematical Rough Set Theory concepts for Sensor Data Mining using Python. Designed custom-built library to process 65,536 objects in 2 minutes with accuracy of 95% using linear regression.
experiences.reasoning: Involved in data analysis and algorithm development, which are critical for developing high-performance computational models.
